attributes.title: Who said yes? Also shower? ğŸ•³ğŸ¥¨
attributes.review: Who? What? When? Where? Why? How? Anyways, people shower because its a trend. its not something that needs to be done its not something that we can its not like drinking food or water its not something that we its im sorry its not something that we actually need its just something that people do. Its a trend. people do it because other people do it and i think people do it because other people do it. To be honest people like to follow the trend. Someone else doing it and everybody else doing it i want to do it I want to fit in I want to do it. Its just kinda like jordans shoes. What is so special about jordans shoes? And me myself i was guilty of it because i used to want it. So i remember i was desperate to get some jordans shoes and when i got them them beaches(âœ¨) was ugly but i still wore them just to fit in. So i lost that mentality a long motherfricking(âœ¨) time ago frick(âœ¨) fitting in frick(âœ¨)what people think. but you know everybody has the mentality of wanting to follow the trend. So thats why a lot of people do it. And im speaking facts even though people are gonna laugh people are gonna think i sound dumb. Im speaking facts cause think to yourself. You have to think to yourself why do i shower? Why do i bath? Why do i do it what am i getting out of doing this? Am i gonna starve if i dont take a bath am i gonna die if i dont take a bath? Its not a neserity like food and water. Basically youre just wasting your own water bill. For no reason because you wanna fit in and i dont understand it because people dont know if you shower or not anyways they cannot tell they cannot tell from adam or eve if you shower or not. So why are you doing it just to fit in and people dont even know if youre really doing it or not? So. Thats all i gotta say about that.
